00013 ## Debugging class to print system configuration; not otherwise used.
00014 class dotFinder(object):
00015     header = 'Content-Type: text/html\n\n'
00016     
00017     # Dump of configuration variables for debugging
00018     configHtml = '''
00019     <HEAD><TITLE>Configuration viewer</TITLE>
00020     <HTML><BODY>
00021     <h3>Configuration:</h3>
00022     <pre>
00023      Configuration file: %s
00024      INDS hostname: %s
00025      INDS viewer hostname: %s
00026      dot command: %s
00027      dot parameters: %s
00028     </pre>
00029     </BODY></HTML>
00030     '''
00031     
00032     ## Run.
00033     def doResults(self):
00034         mc = osSpec.osSpec()
00035 
00036         intHtml = self.configHtml % \
00037         (mc.configFile, mc.indsHostname, mc.viewHostname, mc.dotCmd, mc.dotParams)
00038 
00039         print dotFinder.header + intHtml
00040                 
00041 # End of class dotFinder
00042         
00043 ## CGI magic
00044 if __name__ == '__main__':
00045     page = dotFinder()
00046     page.doResults()
